import React,{useEffect,useRef}from"react";import{DataSet,Network}from'vis-network/standalone/esm/vis-network';function Graph(props){var domNode=useRef(null);// A reference to the vis network instance
var network=useRef(null);// Node Data
var tempNode=[];for(var i=0;i<props.n;i++){var obj={id:i,label:"Node "+i};tempNode.push(obj);}var nodes=new DataSet([].concat(tempNode));// Edge Data
var tempEdges=[];props.data.forEach(function(d){var obj={from:d[0],to:d[1]};tempEdges.push(obj);});var edges=new DataSet([].concat(tempEdges));var data={nodes:nodes,edges:edges};var options={};useEffect(function(){network.current=new Network(domNode.current,data,options);},[domNode,network,data,options]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"canvas"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{ref:domNode,style:{height:"370px",border:"1px solid black",borderRadius:"10px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("br",null));}export default Graph;
